byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Netflix said in its dismal third-quarter earnings report that it had purchased shares at an average cost basis of $218, likely before the company's stock plummeted in mid-September.
snippet: Netflix said in its dismal third-quarter earnings report that it had purchased shares at an average cost basis of $218, likely before the company's stock plummeted in mid-September.
